setting.location: Private office in merchant establishment, documents and maps scattered on large oak desk
setting.weather: Gray morning light through windows overlooking busy commercial street

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, tall athletic build, face showing internal conflict between ambition and conscience
characters.clothing: Dark business suit, white shirt with high collar, gold pocket watch chain, hands stained with ink
characters.position: Seated behind large desk covered with contracts and financial documents
characters.action: Signing military supply contracts while expression shows moral struggle with war profiteering

characters.appearance: Military officer, 50s, weathered face with graying mustache, rigid military bearing
characters.clothing: Military uniform with medals and insignia, polished boots, sword at side
characters.position: Standing at attention beside desk, holding official documents
characters.action: Waiting for signature on contracts for military supplies, representing imperial Russian authority

scene.mainElements: Formal business office with heavy oak furniture, maps showing military campaign routes, stacks of contracts and correspondence, safe in corner containing gold and documents
scene.details: Military supply lists detailing weapons, uniforms, and provisions for war effort, ledgers showing enormous profits from conflict, correspondence from battlefield locations, samples of military equipment and fabric, scales for weighing precious metals, business documents in various languages
scene.background: Bookshelves with commercial and legal texts, portrait of some business predecessor, window view of Warsaw commercial district
scene.atmosphere: Moral ambiguity of profiting from human suffering, necessary compromise between idealistic goals and practical means, weight of making fortune through war while nation suffers under occupation, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot showing both civilian merchant and military officer
composition.focus: The moment of signing contracts representing moral compromise
composition.depth: Foreground: documents and gold coins, middle: two figures completing transaction, background: maps and business appointments
